text:
The following standard JSP 2.0 in web.xml of my webapp does not work in 5.5.x 
(did work in 5.0.18).


<jsp-config>
    <jsp-property-group>
	<display-name>taglibs</display-name>
	<url-pattern>*.jsp</url-pattern>
	<include-prelude>/WEB-INF/lib/taglibs.jspf</include-prelude>
    </jsp-property-group>
</jsp-config>
creator: wgehner@infonoia.com

text:
This works for me quite well (easy to verify using the JSP examples webapp - you
can remove the precompiled JSPs, but since JSP configurations prevent
precompilation, this can be verified right away using the default Tomcat
installation).

Please reopen if you can provide a ready to test .war (with valid
configuration). Adding comments on what "does not work" and what happens also
helps, while trying to file the shortest possible bug report usually does not.
creator: remm@apache.org
